name: They're After My Raygun - 0.21
description:
The demo featuring the first two levels of my WIP Twin-stick Shump.

Features:

This demo is limited to two of the 5 main levels that will make up the finished product.

Includes endless mode which is a randomly generated level that gets faster as you play.

Supports up to 8 player local multiplayer.

Has 5 difficulty settings including a custom difficulty, which allows you to radically customise how the game plays.

The final product will have: 5 normal levels and Extra Bonus levels with misc rules.
